languages.text: "Вы совершаете ошибку, Лорд-капитан. Может, вы и найдете что-то, что замедлит распад, но и только. Идиру Тласс может спасти только чудо".

traits.locale_text: "Вы совершаете ошибку, Лорд-капитан. Даже более того — преступление против тех, кто доверил вам свои жизни. Может, вы и найдете что-то, что замедлит распад, но и только. Для Тласс нет спасения".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."
languages.original_text: "Вы совершаете ошибку, Лорд-капитан. Может, вы и найдете что-то, что замедлит распад, но и только. Идиру Тласс может спасти только чудо".

traits.locale_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Indira Tlass now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Indira Tlass now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你这是在犯错，舰长大人。或许你确实能找到什么东西来减缓恶化，但恶化是无法停止的。现在，恐怕只有奇迹才能挽救伊迪拉·特拉斯了。”
languages.original_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."

traits.locale_text: “你这是在犯错，舰长大人。或许你确实能找到什么东西来减缓恶化，但恶化是无法停止的。现在，恐怕只有奇迹才能挽救伊迪拉·特拉斯了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Está cometiendo un error, Lord Capitán. Tal vez encuentre algo capaz de ralentizar su descenso, pero no lo detendrá. Un milagro es lo único que puede salvar a Idira Tlass».
languages.original_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."

traits.locale_text: «Está cometiendo un error, Lord Capitán. Tal vez encuentre algo capaz de ralentizar su descenso, pero no lo detendrá. Un milagro es lo único que puede salvar a Idira Tlass».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「陛下は間違いを犯しています、ロード・キャプテン。失墜を遅らせ得る何かは見つかるかもしれませんｎが、止めることはできない。イディラ・トラスを救えるとしたら、奇跡だけなのです」
languages.original_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下は間違いを犯しています、ロード・キャプテン。失墜を遅らせ得る何かは見つかるかもしれませんｎが、止めることはできない。イディラ・トラスを救えるとしたら、奇跡だけなのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr macht einen Fehler, Lord Captain. Ihr könnt den Verfall vielleicht verlangsamen, aber nichts kann ihn stoppen. Nur ein Wunder kann Idira Tlass jetzt noch retten."
languages.original_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr macht einen Fehler, Lord Captain. Ihr könnt den Verfall vielleicht verlangsamen, aber nichts kann ihn stoppen. Nur ein Wunder kann Idira Tlass jetzt noch retten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est une erreur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quand bien même vous trouveriez un moyen de ralentir son déclin, le mal dont elle souffre est incurable. À ce stade, seul un miracle pourrait sauver Idira Tlass. »
languages.original_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une erreur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Quand bien même vous trouveriez un moyen de ralentir son déclin, le mal dont elle souffre est incurable. À ce stade, seul un miracle pourrait sauver Idira Tlass. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hata yapıyorsun Lord Kaptan. Bir şekilde kötüleşmesini yavaşlatabilirsin ama asla durduramayacaksın. İdira Tlass'ı artık sadece bir mucize kurtarabilir."
languages.original_text: "You are making a mistake, Lord Captain. Perhaps you will find something to slow the decline, but it will not stop it. Only a miracle can save Idira Tlass now."

traits.locale_text: "Hata yapıyorsun Lord Kaptan. Kötüleşmesini yavaşlatmak için bir şey bulabilirsin belki ama asla durduramayacaksın. İdira Tlass'ı artık sadece bir mucize kurtarabilir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
